alert.note: Alert for Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 12:38PM EDT until June 21 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1138 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Vernon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bradford, Live Oak, Wausau, Hinsons Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Red Bay, Whitehead Crossroads, Greenhead, Red Head, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Five Points, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Poplar Head, Sylvania, Johnson Crossroads and Riverside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
